task-wr.title: Configuring Data Interfaces for VXLANs
task-wr.shortdesc: For VXLANs, static endpoint IP addresses are required on compute host data interfaces.

context.p: For complete information about configuring VXLANs and assigning static IP address to data interfaces, This xref is local in the sys admin guide but interbook in the installation guide.(This topic appears in both guides.)see Titanium Server System Administration:.
